named-query.name: getTraitByLib
named-query.query: select t from Trait t where lower(trim(t.libelle)) = lower(trim(:lib))

named-query.name: getAllTrait
named-query.query: select t from Trait t order by t.id

named-query.name: getCompByLib
named-query.query: select c from Comportement c where lower(trim(c.libelle)) = lower(trim(:lib))

named-query.name: getAllComp
named-query.query: select c from Comportement c order by c.id

named-query.name: getCarByLib
named-query.query: select c from Caracteristique c where lower(trim(c.nomCarac)) = lower(trim(:lib))

named-query.name: getAllCar
named-query.query: select c from Caracteristique c order by c.nomCarac
